TRAVEL NEWS



In the Headlines From Cheapflights.com's daily travel news and other sources:  Government to issue refunds to travelers for late expedited passports  American Airlines' Latin America, Caribbean fare sale ends June 20  House votes to delay passport rules by 17 months  United Airlines adds routes in five key U.S. cities  Fly Los Angeles to Bali for just $735 roundtrip  ATA adds three mainland to Hawaii routes  Angry flyers demand better airline serviceThe Lighter Side of Travel  US News & World Report Issues 'Airport Misery' Index  Harrah's and Jimmy Buffet to Open Margaritaville Casino & Resort  Hotels' New Breed 'Do Not Disturb' Signs Signal More Than ZZZs and Privacy Trip Planning & Destinations  New Rollercoaster Rides Are Big, Bad & Thrilling  Free and Fun in Las Vegas  How to Enjoy Street Food Without Getting Sick  Sip Vino at L.A.'s Trendy Wine Bars  Follow These Tourist Dos and Don'ts to Be Welcomed Anywhere  Cheap Travel: $1 Drinks in San Francisco  Airport Eateries Serve Up  and Deliver  Local Food Favorites  Scenery & Adventure Star in Legendary Motorcycle Road Trips






 





 
GETAWAY CALENDAR







The summer solstice (June 21) is celebrated around the country this week with events and parades such as those held in Santa Barbara. Aspen (CO), June 21August 19: Aspen Music Festival Boston (MA), June 22 thru August 31: Free Movies by Moonlight at the Boston Harbor Hotel Chicago (IL), June 2324: Summerfest in Lincoln Park; thru August 26: Summerdance Miami (FL), thru June 30: Florida Dance Festival; thru July 8: City Theater Summer Shorts FestivalNew York City, thru July 21: Midsummer Night Swing; June 27August 15: Summer in the Square includes live music and dance performances in Union Square. Norfolk (VA), June 2224: Bayoo Boogaloo and Cajun Food Festival Greeley (CO), June 22July 4: The Greeley Independence Stampede includes a rodeo, concerts, parades, fireworks and more. Coming Soon: Chicago (IL), July 1315: Magnificent Mile Art Festival San Francisco (CA), July 14: Bastille Day Celebration Big Pine Key (FL), July 14: Underwater Music Festival
